response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by us, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and the time invested in its development. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an excellent value while ensuring we cover the costs associated with production and delivery. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information about the product. I look forward to potentially working with you on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 12000}
